nodes.bodyText: I see this pattern in other tests too. Why are we removing final modifier for KubernetesClient?
It's not bad, only redundant. When you declare the variable in the resources block, those variables are effectively final.
I may have even introduced some of those in the first place. But I'm trying to make the examples more or less uniform and consistent (still lots to do there)
We should either use logger created above everywhere or System.out.println.

I left some of the examples with System.out|err (those annotated with @SuppressWarnings("java:S106")), since the output stream is used later on either to print stuff (logs in this case), or as a parameter (see Exec examples).
